Reviews.Content: Excelente toda la transacción y la cámara, me llego a tiempo  y cumplo con mis espectativas, es muy linda y tienes muchas funciones.

Reviews.Title: buena camara
Reviews.Author: eva eroina armas
Reviews.Content: recibi el producto en buen estado y a tiempo vendedor recomendo estoy muy satisfecha por el producto recibido gracias s

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: JBo
Reviews.Content: it takes good pictures, nothing expetional, but it is a good camera. nice and small to take everywhere! looks very modern

Reviews.Title: Best Camera I Ever Bought
Reviews.Author: Becky Stahlecker
Reviews.Content: My daughter LOVED this camera, and I became a SUPER HERO in her eyes.  Bought a light pink one for my daughter in law, too!  It's the perfect camera for people on the go.  Fits in your purse or pocket, great images, adoralbe colors, and very good quality camera and pics!

Reviews.Title: GOOD
Reviews.Author: Andres Flores
Reviews.Content: very good quality product very satisfied with the purchase realmete meets the material presented.muy bien el producto de calidad muy satisfecho con la compra realmete cumple con lo presentado.

Reviews.Title: Sooooo slow
Reviews.Author: rawr
Reviews.Content: This camera was ultimately a disappointment. Although there are some good features, overall it is terribly slow, especially when using flash, and it has become a joke with my friends because no one ever knows when it will actually go off, making for some funny pictures. Also, especially with the flash but also without, there is a good chance the picture will be completely blurry. It has become my cheapo camera that I will bring out traveling when I don't want my real camera, which is too bad because it isn't exactly a cheapo price (worth it to spend an extra 20-30 dollars to get the next model up). It's also too bad because I have previously owned cyber-shots that I have loved, so I assumed this would be the same quality.I do, however, LOVE the panorama option and that seems to work pretty well. In general, it works better and faster when I'm not using the flash, so it has been good for camping trips and that sort of thing too. Not terrible quality pictures when it's actually in focus.

Reviews.Title: Not up to Sony quality
Reviews.Author: captnosweat
Reviews.Content: I have been using Sony digital cameras in my work as a yacht broker for 20 years, starting with the mavica, and have found them rugged, and giving years of service in rough and wet environments, till the bezel extender usually fails. I bought the DSC-W530 as an additional pocket camera for my summer in Italy. I laid it down on a marble table in the Vatican (not dropped) and the screen stopped working. The battery trap door fell off in the crowd before I got home. It was a flimsy piece of junk. Luckily, I had two DSC-W55's with me, to save the trip. One of those had been dropped, was put back together with duct tape, and still takes excellent pictures. I returned the new camera to Sony, but they refused to honor the warranty, and asked me to pay twice retail to fix this piece of junk. I guess quality goes out the door when a company gets in financial trouble.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: anraresa
Reviews.Content: perfect, el producto es lo esperado, se ve de buena calidad y lo comprpraqdo llena mis espectativas, sin ningun problema que decir

Reviews.Title: I miss my Pentax...
Reviews.Author: azul258
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in 2010 to replace my stolen Pentax Optio A10.  I thought I was getting a good deal for the price, plenty of mega pixels, small size/weight, decent screen, etc.  I'm no pro, but this camera was still really disappointing.  It takes an eternity to focus and take a picture, which means lots of missed pictures.  Additionally, it often overexposes pictures. My Pentax wasn't perfect, but it was a lot better than this piece of junk!  I can't wait until I can justify purchasing a new camera.  This camera would be perfect for my nieces or nephews!

Reviews.Title: realmente no muy buena
Reviews.Author: eng esc
Reviews.Content: el producto es muy lento lo que lo hace deficiente a la hora de tomar las fotos, aunque utiliza una memoria de alta velocidad la cámara se demora mucho en hacer la captura de la foto por ende la mayoría salen movidas, el zoom es deficiente, el consumo de batería es excesivo, la cámara hace un doble destello al usar el flash lo que confunde a la gente de si capturo o no la foto y la gente sale borrosa, el cargado es muy lento y poco confiable

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: Shop-a-holic
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It is easy on the eyes, slim, and takes great pictures.  Needs a handle to put on wrist.  I purchased one with bling on it and it gave the camera more pizzaz.  I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Working very well.
Reviews.Author: Purple Tang "Long Islander"
Reviews.Content: The camera takes good pictures. It is small and thin. I can put it in my shirt pocket. I can take the pictures for whole day (about 170 photos) without recharging. For this price range it is very good. It is not good at low light environment. In general for the picture quality and physical size I should give it five stars.After taking about 3400 photos it starts shutting itself off unexpectly. Even I have the battery fully charged. The battery has 4.07 V .I am not sure whether it is the end of the life per design. I give it 3 stars for the short life.Update 8/24/2012:I will order a new battery to see whether it will correct the problem. I really love this W530.Update 9/28/2012:After charging the battery fully it works fine. The battery reaches 4.17 V.Update 7/18/2013:I got Panasonic LX-5 and SONY DSC RX-100 after I purchased W530. For daylight outdoor shots, this camera gets great photos, especially its wide angle function. LX-5 is great for indoor or dim light condition. RX-100 has less wide angle capacity than W530, but it has more pixels. RX-100 is good for crop a section of the photo.In general W530 is a very convenient camera. It's tiny. No battery problem.

Reviews.Title: i love my camera
Reviews.Author: enanita
Reviews.Content: I think that it's was one of my buy. Has perfect colors and lights. My picturesa are great. I received it on time and in perfect conditions.

Reviews.Title: Flash is too bright
Reviews.Author: Clint
Reviews.Content: This camera is simple to use however the flash is WAY too bright and there is no "soft flash" setting so all indoor party shots, or out door night shots (when I take pictures the most) come out all washed out :(

Reviews.Title: Good little camera!
Reviews.Author: Mollie
Reviews.Content: I did a LOT of research to see which camera would be best for my boyfriend.  This camera is GREAT for the price!  He likes the color and the pictures it takes!

Reviews.Title: easy and beautiful
Reviews.Author: Waldo
Reviews.Content: this camera arrived in hours,  well maybe 48 hours.  It is easy to use and the downloads to my computer are quick - pics are beautiful

Reviews.Title: Sony cyber-shot review
Reviews.Author: phyllis lewis
Reviews.Content: Fantastic compact camera at an extremely affordable price. Unlike it's competitors in this market, Sony has given this little gem a sweep panoramic feature, a function which provides amazing photos of any vista you might wish to capture, be it interiors at a gathering or sights in the great outdoors. Lovely.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: jndubbs
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price.  I recently purchased as upgrade to previous Sony cameras.  Light weight, user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W530 14.1 MP Digital Still Camera with Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 4x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 2.7-inch
Reviews.Author: Lesels
Reviews.Content: My daughter just loves this!  Takes great pictures & was a perfect gift!  She loves the color and I am pleased with how easy it is to use.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, but leaves a lot to be desired.
Reviews.Author: Von1961
Reviews.Content: Takes very nice, high quality photos if that's all you're looking for. I found that some of the controls are inconvenient, such as the on/off button...it's too small and flat with the frame, making it hard to turn on/off. Also, I do not like that there's no mechanism for a direct upload to my iMac?? Price is very attractive, but, the missing features would be worth a few extra dollars. Sorry...not a big fan of those camera.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: srinivas
Reviews.Content: The intelligent shooting mode is great.It detects different scene types and auto-adjusts the exposure settings to get the best picture. Picture quality is great. It also has a movie mode that takes nice videos.

Reviews.Title: A great camera
Reviews.Author: autumbaby44
Reviews.Content: I gave my daughter this for Christmas. She is happy and that is all that matters to me. No complaints on this end....

Reviews.Title: Excellent zoom
Reviews.Author: Oscar Hernandez
Reviews.Content: the price compare with the type of camera is excellent, perfect photos, easy to use, for me is the best camera in the market.

Reviews.Title: Excellent little camera!
Reviews.Author: Duane R. Waller
Reviews.Content: This little Sony was purchased as a Christmas gift, and the receiver couldn't be happier! So easy to use, simple menus, and it takes a very nice photo for a point-and-shoot. Excellent low-light abilities, too. And very easy to slip into a pocket or purse.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for the 2nd time
Reviews.Author: Jenifa72
Reviews.Content: I loved this camera so much that when I lost the first one, I knew that I would repeat the purchase. It is easy to use and lightweight. The pictures are beautiful!!! A great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Gr8 price, gr8 camera
Reviews.Author: IK5918
Reviews.Content: Initially I was skeptical about this camera since it is my first ever cybershot and at quite low price. But I am very much satisfied with my purchase. No complaints so far. just lovin it!! :)

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Stephanie "Stephanie"
Reviews.Content: This camera works great! Pictures are great and it is easy to use.  The battery is recharged by plugging it in and that sure saves money in batteries. Very good for what we need at our real estate/property management office. Also, Camera arrived faster than expected. Very happy with service & product. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Julio Donis
Reviews.Content: is a good product and I is working very well, this provider met my expectations by giving me a good quality product, I am very pleased with this purchasethanks

Reviews.Title: Worth spending $79.00
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: OMG such a nice blue color camera. I was thinking to get one from pawn shop for my travel purpose but when I found this one from the seller for only $79, I didn't give 2nd thought and that was worth taking. I love it. I will give 4 for the product, 4 for handling and deliver. I want to buy another one but it's out of stock from this seller,please come back soon.I strongly recommend.

Reviews.Title: too fragile
Reviews.Author: mitchell5
Reviews.Content: Within a month the lens locked up.  Lens opens, partially closes, refuses to take pictures, tells you to turn off/on, repeat.  Sent it in (under warrenty) for repair.  Now 5 months later - the lens is locked up again.  It's no longer under warrenty.  Piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: NICE CAMERA i like itt!
Reviews.Author: yobaclock
Reviews.Content: was a giff for my mom and she is happy. he has all a basic camera should will has, nice image, nice picture, nice panoramic image.

Reviews.Title: sony does it again!
Reviews.Author: pamela
Reviews.Content: my daughter has two little girls which are the lights of her life. she was taking pictures of them daily as they were at that stage where they were learning to do everything. the oldest of the two was quite intrigued by picture taking and would take the camera and mimic her mother. to make a long story short, the camera was dropped on the floor and ceased working. my daughter was very sad. her birthday was less than a week away, so i stared searching for a camera to replace the broken one. i came across this sony cyber shot and knew it was the perfect gift, as it was pink. i told her i had purchased it but did not expect it to arrive for a few days. much to my delight, it arrived on her birthday.although she knew i had purchased the camera, she was surprised when she opened her gift. the camera itself is very pretty, it is the perfect shade of pink. it is very easy to use and takes exceptional pictures. we would recomend this camera to everyone, young and old alike. documenting your memories has never been easier or prettier!

Reviews.Title: sastifecho
Reviews.Author: francisco bellorin
Reviews.Content: muy buena la camara la recomiendo a todos los que deseen tener,un es tomado muchas fotos y se ven nitidas

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: flashgordenya
Reviews.Content: the only thing i don't like about this camera is the software that came with it. it maybe thou that i'm just not used to using  it yet. it takes great pics.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot has been nothing but problems!
Reviews.Author: Chicago44
Reviews.Content: We recently purchased the sony cybershot (September) and have had nothing but problems.  Within two months of getting it the camera starting randomly turning off on its own when we were using it. We had to get it serviced and then a month later the pictures were turning out white when we used the camera. We have had the camera for six months and have only been able to use it for one month out of those six. I regret EVER buying this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Peggy S. Moore
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera I have ever owned.  It is easy to use and takes awesome pictures. I wanted a point and shoot camera and this one "foots" the bill.

Reviews.Title: Good price, not so good product
Reviews.Author: Bruno1
Reviews.Content: The price is excelent, but the camera has some details, like the battery recipient, which opens very easily and make it difficult to use the camera...

Reviews.Title: Favorite Camera
Reviews.Author: Little Electron
Reviews.Content: I have had Kodak cameras my whole life and I have been satisfied with them. My boyfriend received this Sony Cyber-Shot camera for Christmas and after seeing the quality of the pictures and the neat panoramic option, I immediately ordered one for myself. The dark blue camera looks a little purple, but I really like that. For roughly 100 dollars or less, I'd say this is the best camera in the price range. I love it and would suggest it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: sebas
Reviews.Content: excellent product. now I'm enjoying to the fullest. I liked it and have recommended it to friends. I really like the purchasethis is one of the best purchases I've mademy mom is very very happy with this camera

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Ricker
Reviews.Content: I am a school teacher and bought this camera for projects and field trips.  It is really nice.  You can do some photo editing on the camera like crop and take out red eye.  It is pretty quick so that I don't miss a shot while waiting after I have just taken a pic.  Also takes very nice pics even when the kids are moving.

Reviews.Title: Unusable blurry images
Reviews.Author: maria
Reviews.Content: This camera takes photos that are terribly blurry and noisy- I have better results from my 2 pixel camera phone. I have yet to take a photo where there is a clear sharp line. All edges are fuzzy and dull and everything has a weird blurred effect that looks like it came out of photoshop's paint effects. I took it back to the shop to compare with another camera in the exact same model to test if mine was broken and couldn't see a difference. The staff agreed that the photos are blurry. Unfortunately I received this as a Christmas gift and could not return it because I was over the return date. The shop where it was bought from has sent it to sony to see if they will send me another model. If they end up just sending it back to me I can guarantee it will not see the light of day because it will be living in my desk drawer.I have already started looking for other cameras.

Reviews.Title: This camera is junk
Reviews.Author: Sion
Reviews.Content: This camera quit working in three weeks. A box appeared on the display screen saying: Turn camera off and on..  We did that many, many times with no result. It would not take pictures. We called Sony and returned the camera. They called us after receiving the camera and said it had been damaged by us and that they would not repair it. We did not damage the camera, it just quit working! Needless to say, we will not purchase another 'Sony' of any kind!!

Reviews.Title: Best Camera I have ever had
Reviews.Author: Jonathan "Jonathan A Butirro"
Reviews.Content: I purchsed this camera at best buy not amazon but I have to say this is the best camera I have ever had I love the inteligent auto, smile detection, 14.1 megapixels, 480p video, and the panoramic. This is about the best camera EVER!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Very good camera, very good price, very good delivery
Reviews.Author: Oscar Schwartz
Reviews.Content: I took advantage of an Amazon offer to buy Sony Camera W-530. It was delivered in record time and I am enjoying it. It is easy to handle, a menu that leads you to where you want to get with no complications. And its prints have a very good definition. My idea was to replace my Cannon A-95 camera with a smaller and handier one to handle. I've taken it all over with good results.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber Shot
Reviews.Author: Fisher
Reviews.Content: The camera was a great price, was delivered on time and in great condition. The only downfall is that the camera did not come with a memory card, which would have been nice since it was a Christmas gift. The color pictured is exactly what the actual product looked like, and my sister LOVES all the cool features that the camera has.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Shopper
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my husband for Christmas. He is a point-and-shoot kinda guy and this camera is perfect for his type of use. It is light and easy to use. Small enough to carry (found a great beltloop carrying case) and the large viewing screen is perfect for those of us who wear bifocals and can't squint or get too close to the screen to see. My husband especially likes the way the camera locks in on subjects in the photo so they are captured clearly. The price was excellent - who needs those high dollar cameras for just preserving day to day life?!

Reviews.Title: Great little Camera
Reviews.Author: Kamau Osborne
Reviews.Content: I won't call myself a photography expert but this little camera is great. The controls are easy to use and for those who like more customisation the menus seem easy to understand even without reading the instruction manual.The pictures are clean and clear and are of fantastic quality. This camera is just right for the price.My only problem (which caused it to lose a star or 2) is that I do not consider the smile detection to be very sensitive and when I tried changing the sensitivity settings it seemed to stop working altogether for awhile and now there is even LESS sensitivity when using smile detection mode. I still like this camera though in spite of that.

Reviews.Title: Awesome and really cheap
Reviews.Author: bengie
Reviews.Content: Well I can Asay that the product arrived at time, it was really affordable less than 100 bucks for a 14MP camera, that is just awesome!!!! I'd have many sony cameras and this one its really good on clarity, bright etc

Reviews.Title: Pink camera
Reviews.Author: Beatrice
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a gift but I did so after knowing someone else who owns one and who gave great reviews of it. I like the size, the color, and the price.

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: My daughter wanted this specific camera for Christmas.  It arrived before the 25th and she's been using it ever since.  She absolutely loves it.  It's the perfect size, so easy to use and the pictures are amazing.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa A. Evans
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. The picture quality is great. The camera is easy to use and lightweight.  Love all the features!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W530
Reviews.Author: Betzabe Garcia
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera! I love it! It's very slim and takes great photos with excellent quality! Panoramic feature it's great and fun! I just love my new camera!

Reviews.Title: Camara DSC-W530
Reviews.Author: Medori4
Reviews.Content: Es una excelente camara. Es economica, rapida, las opcioes son sencillas y de muy bajo peso. Las fotos panoramicas las toma muy facil y quedan muy bien. La recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: onelove
Reviews.Content: I just want to say that I'm very please with this item even though I bought it for my wife, She also love it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: tammy14will
Reviews.Content: My teenage daughter is very happy she received this camera for christmas. This camera takes really nice pictures.I am very pleased with this camera

Reviews.Title: GOOD CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: pwllams1
Reviews.Content: Its a really nice camera for the price, and the smile detection feature is one that most camera in its price rage don't have. I don't like the feel of the camera, feels kind of cheap but the features make it for it. Overall a good buy.

Reviews.Title: A good camera
Reviews.Author: jerson
Reviews.Content: I love this cam!! it has all I needed for my trip to Peru. I thank amazon for everything and I hardly recommend you buying this item. It is a good camera. It has a nice and spectacular screen, and the pics it takes are just wonderful :)

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: The camera came relatively fast and was more then I had expected. It was very hi-tech and has a nice picture quality that's great for the festive season. I'm happy I caught the Black Friday deal to get it at such a cheap price.

Reviews.Title: Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It takes great pictures and is very easy to use.  I would recommend this camera to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Small but dangerous
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I am a sony digital camera person.  I only trust sony when it comes to digital cameras. I have the cyber-shot 7.1 cyber-shot and it great however the DSC-W530 is smaller in size yet more powerful.  It takes great and clear pictures, that's why I call it small but dangerous.  I love it and I would recommend it to all.  After all, you can never go wrong with sony digital cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great so far
Reviews.Author: Mountain Girl "PbD"
Reviews.Content: I've taken about 100 shots so far. About a third were blurry. I believe it to be operator error. It takes a touch longer to focus than my old camera but the results for my patience was outstanding. Haven't mastered the movement of my subject (a 7 month old baby is a bit hard to pose!)but once I try all the features, I think it will be a great camera. The couple amazing pictures I have are so worth it.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Eudes
Reviews.Content: I don't have any complain of this product! it's an excelent camera for me and its really easy to use it for any one.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W530
Reviews.Author: mawortman
Reviews.Content: Small and Compct with lots of features. Large 2.5" LCD to work with.Great Pictures with Video option.  Just what the wife wanted for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W530
Reviews.Author: A. Mottola "ALM"
Reviews.Content: Too bad none of the other reviews mentioned that without the additional memory card, you could only take a handfull of full resolution pictures. Granted the memory cards are inexpensive, I would have liked to have known this up front (and paid a bit extra for a camera with a memory card as part of the package), but only found out when I needed to take 'once in a lifetime' family pictures.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product.
Reviews.Author: Shannin
Reviews.Content: This camera was AMAZING, aside from the low battery life. It takes amazingly clear pictures, making the most un-photogenic people dazzling. Definitely A Great Buy!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Chi lang
Reviews.Content: Great cameraI Love it. super!Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W530 14.1 MP Digital Camera with Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 4x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 2.7-inch LCD (Black)

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: teri
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift for my 13 year old daughter.  She loves it!  It is compact but takes great pictures and downloads easily.  These are great gifts for teenagers and tweens!  Fun for vacations!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: mauren sosa
Reviews.Content: I am satisfied with the purchase and wait for the camera from the description is very well and so far I have not had any problems

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Got to confess that this is my first camera that I bought just because it was a good deal (lighting deal), but after I got it, I cannot let it go. I LOVE THIS CAMERA, simple, quick nothing fancy, does what's suppose to do!!! LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: I love this camera... that's why I've bought three of them to make sure that I'll be able to use them for a while.
Reviews.Author: tsitra
Reviews.Content: I love this camera... that's why I've bought three of them to make sure that I'll be able to use them for a while. No joke. I carry one of the three with me everywhere I go. They really do great work for a small (really small) camera. I highly recommend them.

Reviews.Title: glith
Reviews.Author: juank
Reviews.Content: HelloI feel very dissappointed with the product I got. I bought camera which its battery only last 25 min, when supposed to work around 2 hours at least.

Reviews.Title: Excellent seller
Reviews.Author: M. C. G. Guillen "T¿k@"
Reviews.Content: Item arrived in perfect condition, the camera is super small and lightweight, is easy to operate and basic features. It's simple but comfortable for taking photos

Reviews.Title: Perfect for average camera user.
Reviews.Author: Kiara Pollard
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my mother in pink. She says she loves it. She enjoys the thinness and color. She says is takes great pictures. She takes pictures at family functions, of her grandchild, etc. For the normal, everyday picture taker who just wants to take a picture, this is a good buy. If you're trying to be the next, best photographer, this may not be for you.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: M. Bundy
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my nine year old.  It is a great little point and shoot camera.  Glad to see the cybershot now has a rechargeable battery. This case fits perfectly.  MINI-MEssenger Red Apple Camera Case for Canon PowerShot, Sony CyberShot, Nikon Coolpix, Pentax Optio, Casio Exilim, Olympus Stylus and Panasonic Lumix

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera!
Reviews.Author: J.F.
Reviews.Content: This Camera Is Very Awesome, But Mostly For Unprofessional People Like Me. If You Want To See The Quality Of This Camera Look At The Pictures, Mine Is The One With The Butterfly.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: yagga
Reviews.Content: i love this product, it takes beautiful picturescomfortable and light easy to carry the quality is awesomethe battery power is also good

Reviews.Title: Decent camera
Reviews.Author: S. Mok "CyanM"
Reviews.Content: I got 2 of these, one in blue one in pink. As a camera it's pretty good, not too fancy that my mom will go crazy trying to learn, but with enough options my sister can be hipster when adjusting the lights and stuff. The video camera part is kinda jenky, the mic is terrible, but neither of them plan to use it as a video recorder.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for those on the go
Reviews.Author: Zack Stu "Photographer"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter who is always on the move but loves to take photos. This camera has some great features and is  very durable too. It is small and lightweight but has good zoom and great MP.

Reviews.Title: Great Affordable Camera
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great value. Great for everyday pictures. I am actually purchasing my second one, due to an incident with my girlfriend dropping my first one. Great pictures and a great price for the quality!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Horrible Software
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: We got this camera and I really like it.  We are camera newbies, but this one is really easy to use and takes great photos.  The video is really great and the ability to take 3D photos is neat, though I have yet to take one that actually looks 3D when connected to my 3D TV.However, the software that comes with it is horrible.  It imports your pictures and arranges them by index or by calender, which is nice, but there is no image editing software even for basic stuff and it is not easy to use it along with images from other sources like iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Do not recommend
Reviews.Author: crystal g owonubi
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and only had it for one year and all of the sudden I heard this big "POW" and a bright red light came on and I couldn't get the pictures to show anymore nor would it allow me to turn it on or off so I took the battery out to see what would happen and it went totally dead.

Reviews.Title: Great Point-&-Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: V. Mekkat "sparseseller"
Reviews.Content: I am a SLR user and wanted a camera for my wife to play with and ask other people (who can't handle SLR) to take our snap. From price/performance/handling perspectives, this camera is a 5*.I know that this camera lacks some features like zooming while video recording etc., but if you are looking for simple point-shoot purpose, this is a great one for the price. I left the point-shoot realm a few years back and hence do not know how this compares with other options available though.I never expected this camera to be so sleek. Sometimes you forget you have the camera in hand. So, handle carefully.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for good price
Reviews.Author: Simon
Reviews.Content: This is a very good kids camera, easy to use and practical, great choise for gifts and My First Camera kind of options.

Reviews.Title: Good little companion
Reviews.Author: C. Ponsell
Reviews.Content: I have a big fat SLR camera that I usually use but was going on vacation and wanted something small. While I found this to be lacking the features I was used to I really thought for the price it was a good value. I was a little dissapointed that there was no USB charging capabilities because I had to bring an extra charger, as opposed to just recharging from my laptop, but that was not such a huge deal. Would have been nice if Sony could have putt hat feature on there though.

Reviews.Title: Easy Camera to use
Reviews.Author: mrsdbrock1
Reviews.Content: Great Camera Easy to use. The only thing I didnt like about it was the size . Its a bit smaller than it seems in picture. Overall a happy camper and it came really fast.

Reviews.Title: sony w530
Reviews.Author: bluep
Reviews.Content: very easy to use,has a lot of features that i like.takes a great picture and is light weight.i cant wait to take it on my vacation to lasvegas in dec..

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera For 109
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: It is good camera for 109 bucks later my friend brought the same one for 100 (like a month later) but it works fine and I never had a problem with it

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Ycela & Charles"
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to take about with me to take photos of family and friends, without having to take my bulky sony slr camera! Pretty pink! And works great so far! No complaints!

Reviews.Title: good camera so far
Reviews.Author: C. Benton
Reviews.Content: So far this camera is working out well.  Bought it for my wife as a wedding present so she could take photos during the ceremony and honeymoon.  I haven't used it much but I know she had no trouble getting it out of the box and using it right away.  Takes nice pictures and has many options to work with.  Very small and compact so it's easy for her to carry around no matter where we go. Has decent battery life, what I would expect from this sort of electronic device.  First camera either of us has had so we have nothing to compare it to but it does the job for what we need.  Good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent compact camera
Reviews.Author: Sharpsteel
Reviews.Content: Very compact and well built with a very bright, clear screen. The panoramic mode works better than I expected. Good battery life. Pictures are very good quality with accurate color.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Naresh
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing product for its price. It is very compact. Picture quality is very good. Video quality is not that good. But for this price, it is a very good product. I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Alternative for DSLR owners
Reviews.Author: Michelle E. Manzo
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I was taking a weekend trip to NYC and going to a Giants game. I didn't want to lug along my 7D since I was flying and was nervous about losing/breaking it so I went to the store looking for a low priced point and shoot. They were sold out of Canon so I went for this and it proved to be a great little camera! I love that I can fit it in my pocket, it turns on quick and shoots quick so you can catch good moments when you want them to, and the picture quality is pretty good.  I expected to be really disappointed by the photo quality since I use a higher end camera, but I was really happy with how all the pictures from my trip turned out and I'm sure I'll use it again in the future for similar trips/situations.I wish I had more image control,  the auto settings seemed to work fine but I do like to dabble with my own settings every once in awhile. That said, it's really not what this camera is designed for, so it isn't a real big negative.I didn't try video mode, but for quick little home videos and short videos on trips I'm confident it would be adequate.If you're looking for a simple, compact, easy to use camera that's going to give you solid picture quality, this is a a great option!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: mariajj
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived in perfect conditions and all the features described above were accomplished. I'm very pleased with it's performance, and the pictures quality. It's size is perfect for taking it anywhere in  a handbag or even in a pocket. The only thing that is a little annoying is that the battery cap is al little loose so it tends to open with a minimum touch, but it's not  a big problem because it doesn't break or anything.I really recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Love it compact and handy to use
Reviews.Author: Nkiser
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I bought it to take on a motorcycle trip.  Small enough to fit into my jacket pocket.  Took pictures while moving and they turned out great.  Also took a lot of video worked great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent simple camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Shevy"
Reviews.Content: Takes really nice pics. Take excellent pics in the dark! I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a simple snap shot camera. Worth the price!

Reviews.Title: neat little camera
Reviews.Author: Lou Callahan
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to take quick snapshots of the grand-kids, events, etc. It was pocketable and offered a lot for the money, i thought. It sure did. Very pleased with the quality of pictures and ease of use. Even though i'm clumsy, I ws able to get the controls to work. Small didn't mean hard. All in all, very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality!
Reviews.Author: itzArchie
Reviews.Content: I didn't expect to buy any electronics online, but when I did, I got the best quality and the best price. I would never think twice buying from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: ljo2010
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with my purchase.  It came with all of the necessary cables and battery, as well as in the original box.  The camera is very high quality and it is at a great price.  I would recommend this to someone looking for a good camera for an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: Picture Quality Excellent
Reviews.Author: Tennie K. White
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Sony to replace an older Sony digital Camera. I have found that the camera is very easy to use. If you have older sony cameras the battery is not compatible and the flash card is not compatible with this newer model.The camera is light and the bottom of the case which covers the battery compartment is flimsy.However, If you are looking for a camera with exellent picture quality this one will fit the bill. Sharp pictures both near and far.So far I'm pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W530 14.1 MP Digital Still Camera with Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 4x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 2.7-inch
Reviews.Author: Jose Simon
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera! i love Sony products. Very easy to use! the display is nice. A lot of different options for picture mode.

Reviews.Title: i will recommend it to my friends
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: it's perfect as the price,although it's smaller than my imagination,anyway,if you don't wanna pay much money and want a pretty camera,you can choose this one.

Reviews.Title: Awsome little camera, easy to use
Reviews.Author: Gorilla
Reviews.Content: I am older and not too savvy on the new technology but this little camera is easy to use, very small & takes geat pictures

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!!
Reviews.Author: twinters2505
Reviews.Content: So I haven't had this camera for very long but so far I love it.  It takes amazingly good pictures for as cheap as it was and I have no complaints.  The smile shutter is an awesome feature too because you don't have to worry about pressing the shutter it just does it all by itself.  I would recommend this camera to anyone that wants a very nice camera with a lot of good features but doesn't need every single option in the world.  Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Portable Lightweight easy to use.
Reviews.Author: ThePeoplesChamp
Reviews.Content: Highly recommended. My last SOny camera was the tsc touch screen $300+ dollar camera. IT was good and all but this sony camera is much more versatile than the older one I had. Reason I bought this one is because my last Sony was a touch screen and the screen eventually wore out after 4 years of good use. Now after dealing with the touch screen problem I decided to stay away from that type of setup and go back to analog push button. This is perfect for what I need in a camera. Versatile, light weight and very good picture quality.

Reviews.Title: One of the best!!!
Reviews.Author: Deepak Reddy
Reviews.Content: Worth buying the camera, the stills are excellent. The pics are super clear, and very rarely blurring occurs. The video quality too is great.

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: Nicole_26
Reviews.Content: I just love this camera. I bought a really great Sony Cybershot in 2009 but it was stolen in February 2011. I wanted to replace it for a trip to Ireland over the summer, but I did not want to a buy the same top of the line model. I went with this one and I am so glad I did.First of all, the price is really unbeatable. The number of megapixels you can get for just over $100 is incredible.I took this camera with me to Ireland for three months. It was fantastic because the battery life would last for an entire weekend filled with hiking and loads of picture taking. There is no bulky dock either, I like that I only needed a USB cord. This camera does require that battery charging be done on a wall unit. This is not ideal for a trip to Europe, but I experienced no problems when using a voltage converter, it never got too hot or lessened the battery life.If you are looking for something that won't break the bank but is really quality, I think this is a great option. I like the blue because I thought the black one looked dated. It is pretty bright, if you are conservative go with silver or black. It is really really blue.Update:About a year later, this product is still a great value. Of course, I don't think a new generation has been released, but it is gratifying that I can walk into a Target and not see a camera by the same make that is twice as good for the same price. Image quality is good for the price and with a little editing some of my photos from Ireland are print and frame quality. I also like that the item comes with a cord instead of a dock + cord like some of the other Cybershots. This is ideal for traveling, it packs up much lighter and you can import photos without a hard, flat surface (say from your bed in a hostel). The dock on my old Cybershot was unnecessary.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber
Reviews.Author: Gaddie
Reviews.Content: We are beyond satisfied with the purchase. The camera works great and we love having a smaller camera for vacations. Very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Worth a buy
Reviews.Author: PP
Reviews.Content: I have bought this camera for my nephew as he luvs to play with my DSLR but at 11 cant use it moe than point and shoot, given the price this si one of the best deal you can crack, the photo quality is decent works in house and outdoor, I am not point and shoot fan as I luv DSLR and playing wioth lens but must say things that can slip in ur pocket easily is a must have

Reviews.Title: Generally OK, but a few annoyances & disappointments
Reviews.Author: Coolius_y
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace an aging Cybershot DSC-W80 that I had owned for  6 years,  and had served me well.Generally, the DSC-W530 performs satisfactorily;  it is smaller & lighter,  and does have more features,  such as the intelligent selector.The primary disappointment was that it took about 2 seconds after taking a shot, for the picture to appear in the LCD screen. In the DSC-W80 it was not more than a second,  so I definitely felt the delay.  Perhaps those who have not experienced faster performance would not be quite as disappointed. I tried taking shots at various settings and programs,  and the lag occurred in every instance.The pictures came out fine,  but tend to be grainy when I try to zoom in onto details - and this happened with every resolution setting from VGA up to 14MP.  Fortunately,  I do not need that feature often,  so I did not consider it as a major problem;  others may tend to disagree.All told,  I do not think that the W530 is any great improvement over the old W80,  but as I continue to use it,  I guess I will learn to live with it - I am a casual amateur photographer, after all.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Maria Martinez
Reviews.Content: Very good camera, delivery was on time. 100% Recommended.I was hoping that the camera had more options regarding the types of photos and backgrounds, but overall is very good.

Reviews.Title: Icons
Reviews.Author: Barbara F. Greer
Reviews.Content: This camera is not at all what I expected it to be. When transferring pictures to my computer, I have to go thru about 32 Icons before I can get to my pictures. They come up everytime I make a transfer. It could be one picture or 1oo pictures and all these Icons show up. It is not as easy as I thought it would be. I have read all the instructions and have no idea how to stop this from happening each time. None of my other cameras has ever done this when transfering to my computer. My 9 year old Granddaughter has the Sony DSC-W510. I transfer her pictures all the time and her camera does not have all these icons show up. I hate this camera.

Reviews.Title: SONY CYBER SOT DSC W530 14.1 MP
Reviews.Author: Dagmar
Reviews.Content: I have a Sony NEX5 with great quality pictures but needed something I could stick in my pocket or purse for quick shots.  This was the answer.The drawbacks:  hard to hold steady since it is so small (choices).You have to hold it a certain way.  Sometimes, even though the button is big, I have to find a "sweet spot" to make it work.  And often the camera moves when I push the button.  Meanwhile the shot is gone.These maybe my disablitlites causing this.  I have gotten some good shots with it.I like the panonramic feature and the movies came out nicely.I think I would look for anti shake feature next time.  I think it was worth the $112.00

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!!
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent pocket point & shoot camera. I was amazed at the quality of the pictures and especially the videos. I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: It's good!
Reviews.Author: Guilherme Tajiri
Reviews.Content: This is a good Digital Camera. This camera is not professional, so the battery life is not excellent, but nothing that compromises its use. It's ok! If you want only to take family photos, travel photos...is a excellent digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot, So Kool
Reviews.Author: David E. Kerridge "Wagoosh"
Reviews.Content: I have found this camera to be very handy, and the picture and movie quality is just great.  I'm glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Manuil J. Chavez
Reviews.Content: Works well, the best thing about it is that my wife likes it and hasn't asked for another camera. Power it on and it opens up very quick ready to shoot in a matter of seconds. Has a great easy to use panorama feature.

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: hbk320
Reviews.Content: this camera is worth the price, cheap but not bad. the quality of the picture is goodthe only thing I'm concerned about is the video capture mode, it is mono, not stereo.

Reviews.Title: cheap & pretty good
Reviews.Author: feifei
Reviews.Content: It's cheap and the quality of photo is pretty good.Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W530 14.1 MP Digital Still Camera with Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 4x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 2.7-inch LCD (Black)

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality Photos - Really!
Reviews.Author: S. Jones
Reviews.Content: Although I own a Nikon D90, I bought the Sony Cybershot because I wanted a small camera I could throw in my pocket and play with. This Sony Cybershot got excellent reviews and it was the right price.The camera looks great but feels cheap in your hands. The power and shutter buttons are clunky. To turn it on or take a photo, I have to press buttons hard with my fingernail. The 3-second recycling time per shot seems a bit long. Take a photo .... wait.  Take a photo ... wait.Forget the 14+ megapixels. That means nothing when the lens and the processor are cheap. Carl Zeiss lens? Who cares! A gazillion photo-taking features? Why bother! The Cybershot's photos lack detail and are quite poor in quality. As a matter of fact, they look like they've been doctored with the smart blur feature in Photoshop. Everything has that slick model clay look. What is the value of being able to make a 13" x 9" print that looks like total crap?I also own a 5-year-old Canon Powershot (5 megapixels) that takes better photos. I've made small art prints with it. In fact, my parents bought a 7 megapixel GE digital camera from Walgreens a few years ago for $85, and it takes better photos. Heck, I'd bet I can get crisper (though smaller) photos from my cheap iPod camera.This is a kid's camera, nothing more. If this were $40, I'd forgive a lot of its flaws. But at $100+, it's way overpriced. I returned mine.

Reviews.Title: I love my sony camera
Reviews.Author: Hoodstar
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my birthday and I LOVE it. It has a great solid feel it and is nice and small so it fits in my pocket or purse no problem!! The lcd on the back is great and it takes great pix.

Reviews.Title: Awful!
Reviews.Author: AmazonJess
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because of the great reviews and price. However, the screen is extremely "fuzzy" (for lack of a better word); no matter what setting I use in whatever kind of lighting, the pictures are blurry and unfocused (I even tried using a tripod to help stabilize the camera). I have yet to contact Sony, but given other reviews on here, I'm not holding my breath that they'll be very helpful. Very disappointed in this camera.

Reviews.Title: Love. . . this Sony W530 Digital Camera.!.!.
Reviews.Author: Robin~!~
Reviews.Content: I bought the Sony W530 - 14.1 camera for my daughter, she loves it.!. It is light weight, fits easily into handbags and takes good quality digital photos. Super user friendly and the Carl Zeiss lens, along with the wide angle option really adds to the camera's digital features -- providing the user with additional options to capture images. Overall, this camera produces nice quality images, wide angle and video, and for the price you can't beat it .!.!.

Reviews.Title: Great gift idea.
Reviews.Author: Fordman
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for my 19y/o son for Christmas 2011.About the best gift he has gotten the last few years, he goes to a lot of concerts and now we are really impressed with his candid photos. Software menus are easy to use and a LOT more features than we were aware of at the time of purchase.

Reviews.Title: poor quality
Reviews.Author: janet
Reviews.Content: I had it for just one month when i started hearing a grinding noice when turned on.Picture quality was also bad.  A lot of blurred pictures and bad lighting.So bad I gave it to my 4 year old as a toy.Lesson learned: Never buy a camera under $100

Reviews.Title: Lacks East-Asian Languages Support
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: The product lacks support for any East-Asian languages such as Chinese, Japanese or Korean. The specification page fails to mention what language the item supports. I naturally assumed that Sony, being an international company, should have the major languages. I am disappointed; so are my parents, who read only Chinese, and who receive this as a Christmas gift. It is a good camera; I just have to teach them all the functionality by recognizing the individual menu positions and icons. In addition, the Sony website does not offer firmware downloads that support East-Asian languages.

Reviews.Title: Don't like it :(
Reviews.Author: stacy guzman
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace a Canon one I had lost. Its appearance looks cheaper to me. The screen has a fuzzy line across it like a busted plasma tv that it got just from being in my purse while in its case... Now I have to buy another replacement.

Reviews.Title: Pretty in Pink
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter for a beach camera for a summer vacation.  Flawless pictures. Extremely portable. She brought home some of the most incredible pictures from her vacation to the beach with a friend this summer.

Reviews.Title: the worst camera i have ever used
Reviews.Author: Skylande
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother as a birthday gift. After my mother opened the box and was happy, i borrowed the camera to play around a bit. My first impression was that the build is pretty good. It is solid and really compact. However, that is the only good thing this camera has to offer. The image quality is really poor and noisy. The auto modes are so simple that they are really frustrating to use. It may be me who haven't mastered the use of the camera yet, but i hate the way it flashes every single time there is not enough light instead of using or allowing the user to use a slower shutter speed. On top of that, the flash is also really harsh and awful.I get many pictures which are overexposed by the camera even thought those pictures were taken in a moderated lit room. This camera is really the type that fits the old saying "you get what you pay for" perfectly.  Generally, the build is good and compact. However, the picture quality is super awful. Digital noises are everywhere. I regret buying this for my mother as a birthday gift.  Note: this is just my personal experience and knowledge. I don't intentionally denounce sony or anything. In fact, i love sony compact camera. However, this DSC-W530 is really Sony's defective design.

Reviews.Title: It is like being a ghostbuster!
Reviews.Author: Feyno Tal
Reviews.Content: I got this item so that I could play ghostbusters for real.  I use the camera to capture peoples souls (like the proton pack).  Then I got a few of the digital frames to hold the soul and display them in, just like the Muon Trap.  It works like a charm.  Now all I need is a brown jumpsuit and an old ambulance to drive around in.

Reviews.Title: I wouldn't call this an "Easy-To-Use" camera
Reviews.Author: Niku
Reviews.Content: .Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W530 14.1 MP Digital Still Camera with Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 4x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 2.7-inch LCD (Blue)I'll be back later to discuss the quality of the camera, and the prints you can get with it. Today, however, I'll only mention usability. Now, it may be that "Easy-To-Use" camera are no longer made. If that's the case, my remarks will seem bizarre and a trifle crotchety (Well, I'm entitled, I'm old enough). Anyway, to me, "Easy-To-Use"  doesn't mean that in order to take your own picture, or to turn the Flash ON or OFF, you have to struggle and puzzle your way through a series of Menus and Screens. No, it means that if you want to take your own picture you move the SELF-TIMER button or lever, and if you want the FLASH On or Off, you do the same thing. So, although this might be "Easy-to-Use" for the current generation of cameras, it is unacceptably difficult to use by my standards. Of course, if I used the camera all the time, I would be singing a different tune. However, I don't, so before I bought this  camera, I made a lengthy search for a quality digital camera that was "Easy-To-Use," and I bought this camera on the basis of what I found. I already have four or five other cameras, but I wanted to have one that I could use once a year with perfect confidence. I didn't want a camera that required a manual to use, and to me, that is what this camera is.I wonder if I could find a Brownie in good working condition. Better yet, maybe there's a website somewhere that uses "Easy" the same way I do.

Reviews.Title: Bought for my gf and she loves it
Reviews.Author: scubamark86
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my girlfriend, it replaced her kodak easy share and loves it from the hi res to the pink color.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Luciana Silva Malard Neves
Reviews.Content: Loved it, liked it a lot. Loved it, liked it a lot.Loved it, liked it a lot.Loved it, liked it a lot.

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: lulu
Reviews.Content: I bough this camara 7 month ago (i regret it) and it works fine, came on time but just the quality it feel cheap, the pics don't look as good as my first one. I could swear it's not going to last as my first sony camara (Sony Cybershot DSCW55 7.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom) I had the one for 7 years and carry it around in my purse at least 5yrs and drop it many times when riding the motorcycle, great pics, setting, better quality. But it didn't survive the last fall in sequoia national park last year. when I starded looking for a new one I tough this was going to be even better but the truth is I would buy the first one but now it's very expensive more than $300.

Reviews.Title: Excelente!
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: Excelente! los recomiendo 100%, el envío fue rápido, el articulo llego tal cual fue descrito en las características del producto.. Compra realizada desde Venezuela!!

Reviews.Title: Not happy with this camera
Reviews.Author: MyOpinion
Reviews.Content: This camera is so very frustrating.  It is lacking something the older models had and I just do not like it.  I had to exchange the first one due to large sensor dust that ruined many of our family pictures to the Grand Canyon.  I was a little relieved to see the dust spot because of the horrible focusing and other issues I had on this trip.  I figured if I exchanged the camera, the new one would work like my old Sony that was stolen from us.  Unfortunately, this wasn't the case.  The camera just is not any good.  I shoot professionally with a Canon 5D and 24-70 2.8, but bring the small cameras everywhere I go with the kids so I do not have to deal with the big camera, or worry about it getting stolen or damaged.  I know how to manipulate settings on them to get what I need, but no matter what I do this camera just will not respond properly.  I will keep this one until it gets lost or quits working (which hopefully will be soon so I can replace it with something better).

Reviews.Title: right on time and perfect!

Reviews.Content: package came right on time and was exactly what was promised! VERY happy! i'll be shopping with them again for sure! great product :)

Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: me and this camera have been through alot ive had for almost 2years and i am just now getting a new one.. and its just because my children dropped it so many times!

Reviews.Title: Sony review
Reviews.Author: Christine L. Rodick
Reviews.Content: I used to own a Sony Cybershot DSC-S90 which I absolutely loved, it took great pictures then I dropped it and broke it.  I ordered this one thinking it would be just as good but a lot of my pictures were blurry did not focus well.  I sent it back.

Reviews.Title: Why can't Sony use standards?
Reviews.Author: John Bartas
Reviews.Content: I got this for my daughter. I had very bad luck with Sony reliability a decade or so back; one Trinitron TV I bought died after 91 days - one day after the warranty ran out. Our Sony camcorder went in for repair every few months for years, until the extended warranty ran out. Even though we didn't pay to fix it, we missed a lot of memories while it was being repaired. After that, I swore no more Sony products.But my daughter really wanted this, and the reviews seemed OK, so I gave it a chance. It seemed OK until she lost the computer cable needed to download photographs. That's when I remembered the other reason I avoid Sony: The memory card is a weirdo format only made by Sony - it doesn't fit any of the standard card readers we have, either at home or at work. Same with the cable - Sony could have used an ordinary USB, but instead they put a non-standard Sony-only connector on the camera. Bottom line is that to get my daughters pictures I have to pay Sony a ridiculous price for a specialty item that is useless except for this camera. This time I swear: No more Sony for me.Too bad, because the camera is OK otherwise. It takes good pictures, is easy to use, and still works fine after 6 months.Update: I actually found a card reader at my local drugstore for $20 which read the Sony's goof-ball memory card. My daughter got her pictures, and I only wasted $20 and several hours of my time. I still wish Sony should use standard connectors and parts rather than trying to lock us in to their own non-standard designs, but except for that my daughter likes the camera; so I upped my rating to 3 stars. However for my next camera I'm going back to Canon - they make solid, standards-based cameras, even if they don't make a pink one; and every canon I ever bought still works - some (like my 35mm SLR film camera) over 20 years later. But if you never lose cables, don't want to swap or read memory cards, and really like Pink, then this Sony might be OK for you.

Reviews.Title: Perfect choice!
Reviews.Author: joannothing
Reviews.Content: If you need speed and high quality pics this is all that you need! A smart camera! Big display, i love the Sony Cyber-Shot cameras and this one is a good exaple what i means!

Reviews.Title: Terrible Quality
Reviews.Author: Camera
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera thinking that it would be great due to all the comments I read on it. Everyone said that it was a great camera for the amount of money it costs.I used it once before for a still picture and it came out very nice but yesterday I finally tried to use it at dinner and EVERYONE ONE OF MY PICTURES CAME OUT BLURRY/OUT OF FOCUS.Maybe just this one sucks, but I have experience with cameras and know how to change settings and what not but this one could not be fixed!

Reviews.Title: compras
Reviews.Author: Pedro
Reviews.Content: bueno para ser primera ves que compro algo por aquí quede satisfecho y es muy bueno el producto me llego en el tiempo estipulado excelente lo recomiendo ampliamente

Reviews.Title: NO!
Reviews.Author: Todd C. Caito "tc6952"
Reviews.Content: i got this camera a couple years ago as a gift for Chirstmas and loved it! I had previously owned a similar Sony CyberShot camera and had a lens issue and was so excited to have a new one.Until about 6 months later i went out of town to visit one of my best friends and the screen went completely white! i couldn't see what i was shooting at all or any of the pictures i had taken. Eventually, it began to flash from white to the actual picture giving me the opportunity to fix it. I went online to try to find instructions for the problem, which i found, only to have them not work. On top of that i found the shooting was very slow and my photos would turn up with a yellow tint  (which i thought might be the white balance, but was not). So i strongly suggest not getting this camera!

Reviews.Title: Its a excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Jhonattan Paniagua
Reviews.Content: I likes the sony's camara, because its best, this camera have a good zoom, the picture its very good, buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: upset
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on this camera and it didn't look too bad.  It even has the Carl Zeiss lens.  It is a low priced camera so I guess you get what you pay for.  The battery door/sd card door  feels like it will fall off with a high wind gust.  The camera feels cheap.  Disposable cameras feel like they are built better.  The shutter lag really does lag.  For shooting indoors like at a restaurant with my family, it  was embarrassing.  The waiter attempted to take a shot and he held down the shutter for about 3 seconds, then a series of three flashes went off for around 3 seconds.  By the time it actually took the photo (after the 3rd flash) the waiter was moving his hand and the photo was blurry.  I'm not too sure on how long the battery life is cause I returned it for an upgrade.  For the price, it is a camera, and it does take photos, but my 3 megapixel camera from 2004 works better.  Oh, the panorama seemed to work fine from the one time I tested it, but the "smile activated" shutter feature doesn't really work.

Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for about a month and it already broke!!!! The slot where the memory card is supposed to go will not allow a memory card to enter.....!!!!!!!!! So frustrating, and I can't return it now, the window JUST expired!!!

Reviews.Content: This camera have a not good quality photo for the 14.1 MP, I do not recomend it. Is like china camera.

Reviews.Content: Comapred to my DSC-W50, this camera is cheap junk. It's going back.  It's light and flimsy and has no controls like the W50. I can't believe that Sony changed so much in 5 years.  I would prefer the older camera with less megapixels than this piece of junk.  It made me go out to the store and take a look at the new Sonys' -- they're all JUNK.

Reviews.Title: Waiting
Reviews.Author: ggg
Reviews.Content: Iam very woried because I have not received my camera that was shipped december 12th, please write back and explain what happened to it.

Reviews.Title: Would buy if it used SD cards
Reviews.Author: Glenn Z
Reviews.Content: Why does Sony continue to use the memory stick format?  I would love to buy this if it used traditional memory cards.

Reviews.Title: Girls Camera
Reviews.Author: Cris
Reviews.Content: Gave as a gift to teenage niece. Durable gets the job done she was nt to crazy about the color.
